original_text: For seven days, you must eat flat bread that has no yeast in it. On the first day of the Passover festival, you must take all the yeast out of your houses. During those seven days, if anyone eats bread with yeast in it, he will no longer belong to my people, the Israelites.
korean_text: 너희는 이레 동안 무교병을 먹을지니 그 첫날에 누룩을 너희 집에서 제하라 무릇 첫날부터 일곱째 날까지 유교병을 먹는 자는 이스라엘에서 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: For seven days, you must eat flat bread
sentences.korean_translation: 칠 일 동안 너는 누룩 없는 빵을 먹어야 한다

sentences.original_text: that has no yeast in it.
On the first day of the Passover festival,
you must take all the yeast out of your houses.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 너희 집에서 모든 누룩을 제거해야 한다.

sentences.original_text: if anyone eats bread with yeast in it,
he will no longer belong to my people, the Israelites.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 더 이상 나의 백성 이스라엘 자손에게 속하지 않을 것이다.
